emojis.name: spade suit
emojis.description: A spade symbol emoji, which is used in card games for the spades suit.

emojis.name: flower playing cards
emojis.description: A type of cards known as hanafuda cards in Japan which are used for a range of different games

emojis.name: framed picture
emojis.description: A framed picture of a painting or photograph, as displayed in a gallery or on a household wall.

emojis.name: knot
emojis.description: Brightly colored rope forming a knot.

emojis.name: lab coat
emojis.description: A white coat worn in a science laboratory.

emojis.name: jeans
emojis.description: Denim jeans, worn by men or women.

emojis.name: dress
emojis.description: A pretty dress, suitable for a ball, party or other similar occasion.

emojis.name: clutch bag
emojis.description: A small pouch, somewhere between the size of a handbag, and a purse

emojis.name: thong sandal
emojis.description: A single flip flop or thong sandal. Often worn to the beach andor in warm weather.

emojis.name: video game
emojis.description: A video game emoji, shown on major platforms as a console gamepad with D-pad

emojis.name: rainbow
emojis.description: The colorful arc of a rainbow, as may appear after rain. Generally depicted as the left half of a full rainbow, showing six bands of color

emojis.name: umbrella on ground
emojis.description: A large, open umbrella, as provides shade at a beach or patio.

emojis.name: high voltage
emojis.description: A symbol for high voltage, as warns against injury from electricity.

emojis.name: snowman
emojis.description: A classic snowman, as Frosty the Snowman, with snowflakes

emojis.name: fire
emojis.description: A flame, as produced when something is on fire. Depicted as a red, orange, and yellow flickering flame.

emojis.name: comet
emojis.description: A comet, an icy, rocky space object that can form a tail of gas and dust when near the sun.

emojis.name: droplet
emojis.description: A single, light blue droplet, as of water, sweat, or tears. May be used for various types of liquid.

emojis.name: jack-o-lantern
emojis.description: An orange pumpkin carved into the shape of a face and commonly known as a Jack-oâ€™-lantern.

emojis.name: christmas tree
emojis.description: A classic Christmas tree, an evergreen tree decorated with lights and ornaments to celebrate Christmas.

emojis.name: fireworks
emojis.description: Firework emoji, showing a explosion of colored light in the night sky, used for any number of celebrations

emojis.name: sparkles
emojis.description: The glittering flashes of sparkles.

emojis.name: tanabata tree
emojis.description: A Tanabata tree, a type of wish tree on which people hang wishes written on paper and other

emojis.name: carp streamer
emojis.description: Japanese koinobori, decorative, carp-shaped windsocks flown in celebration

emojis.name: american football
emojis.description: The oval ball used in the game of American football

emojis.name: volleyball
emojis.description: A volleyball emoji, showing the round ball used in the sport.
